home.sub_title:
### Analysis and Systems Development Student
#### Facens | Sorocaba-SP
home.about_me: Seeking an opportunity in the field to enhance my knowledge. I am committed to building a solid career by working on challenging projects, collaborating with talented teams, and developing innovative solutions.
home.experience:
- LINCE Facens Voluntary Internship, 06/2021-12/2021:
  * Inmoov Project, which consists of a robotic arm controlled by Arduino microcontroller. Conducted research to develop gesture recognition algorithms in Python to identify finger movements and reproduce them on the prototype.
- BRAIN Facens Internship, 01/2022-05/2022:
  * Optical character recognition research using Python. Completed projects from the Python Crash Course on Coursera, monitored through the Monday project management tool.
- FIT | Flextronics MCTI Future Vacation Program, 01/23:
  * HandsOn Project: software development using the Flutter framework and Dart language, and firmware development for the ESP32 microcontroller. Created a smartwatch prototype that measures heart rate using a Heart Beat Rate sensor and displays the data in a Flutter app via Bluetooth.

project_list.title: OCR Tesseract
project_list.description: This project is an implementation of an algorithm to read identification documents and display their image in real-time on a camera, developed in Python using the Jupyter Notebook IDE.

project_list.title: OCR Paddle
project_list.description: This project is an implementation of an algorithm to read identification documents and display their image in real-time on a camera, developed in Python using the Jupyter Notebook IDE.

project_list.title: Java Challenges BootCamp Banco PAN - DIO
project_list.description: I share my Java language studies developed during my journey in the Banco Pan Boot Camp through the Digital Innovation One platform.

project_list.title: Hands On | Vacation Program | FIT | Flextronics
project_list.description: Developed firmware on the ESP32 microcontroller connected to a Heart Beat Rate sensor to measure heart rate, simulating a smartwatch. The data is displayed in an app via a chat developed in Flutter.

project_list.title: Titanic Challenge Kaggle | Brain - A.I League Brain - Facens | Sorocaba
project_list.description: In this project, I explore machine learning techniques to predict the chances of survival in the Titanic disaster.

project_list.title: Drawbridge - Facens | Sorocaba
project_list.description: This project, created for the UPX | Creative Engineering discipline, explores Pascal's Principle. I developed firmware in the C language for the Arduino UNO microcontroller, along with technical drawings and the development of a miniature prototype.

project_list.title: Automated Irrigation - Facens | Sorocaba
project_list.description: This project, created for the UPX | Creative Engineering discipline, explores the theme of Water. I developed firmware in the C language for the Arduino UNO microcontroller, along with technical drawings and the development of a miniature prototype.
